## About

Prof. Dietmar Thal is a renowned neuropathologist specializing in the study of protein changes in Alzheimer's disease. His research focuses on understanding the sequence and patterns of pathological changes in neurodegenerative diseases.

## Research Interests

- Sequence of protein changes in AD
- Neuropathological staging of AD
- Protein aggregation patterns
- Disease progression markers

## Selected Publications

- Thal DR, et al. (2019). Sequence of Aβ protein deposition in the human medial temporal lobe
- Thal DR, et al. (2015). Phases of Aβ deposition in the human brain
- Thal DR, et al. (2012). Neuropathology and biochemistry of Aβ and its aggregates in AD
